$With the bases full, Hornsby sent up a pop fly a yard or two in front of the plate, which Krueger muffed.  Smith, on third, dashed for the plate.  Ward received Krueger's throw and stepped on the plate, believing that Smith was forced. Umpire Rigler called Hornsby out on an infield fly, however, and allowed Smith's tally to count, declaring that Ward should have tagged the runner.'
